scavenge.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if an animal scavenges, it eats anything that it can find
scavenge.translation[0].definitions[1].d: if someone scavenges, they search through things that other people do not want, for food or useful objects
scavenge.translation[0].definitions[1].e: There are people who live in the dump and scavenge garbage for a living.
Women were scavenging for old furniture.
